title: Hawaii’s Hottest New Beachfront Resort Has Opened on Waikiki Beach
description: Steps from one of the world’s most famous shorelines, the opening of ‘Alohilani Resort Waikiki Beach is quickly becoming the talk of the town. Featuring arguably one of Honolulu’s most Instagram-worthy infinity pools and a three-story, 280 thousand-gallon Oceanarium, the $125 million revamped resort has provided a modern oasis for the who’s who of Oahu. Enjoy a six or eight-night beachfront escape with a daily breakfast box for two, four cocktails to share, a US$150 credit to use throughout the resort, access to Island Club and Spa’s fitness facilities and more.
